name: Dogs Jigsaw Puzzle Game. Premium
description:
Are you a true admirer of jigsaw puzzles but tired of constantly missing pieces? We have a way out! Cute animal puzzles is the best choice for you!

A wide selection of high quality pictures will bring many hours of fun to the whole family while playing beautiful jigsaw puzzles.

The game is so easy to play. Parts which are placed correctly will stick together. Assemble pieces into groups, then move and connect the groups. With 5 difficulty levels both children and adults will enjoy these cute puppy puzzles.

Dog jigsaw puzzles are also designed for the development of fine motor skills, logical thinking, concentration, attention visual and spatial thinking.

What makes jigsaw puzzles animals special?

- Rich collection of cute doggies jigsaw puzzles hd will challenge your brain;
- 5 difficulty modes suit for all ages starting from easy levels for kids to really challenging modes for experts;
- Collect jigsaw puzzle puppies of different sizes: 6, 24, 54, 96, 150 pieces;
- Pleasant background music contributes to the relaxing atmosphere;
- Play without connection to the Internet;
- Intuitive interface and touch controls are designed to be played easy animal puzzles for kids even by toddlers and preschool children;
- This puzzle pets works perfectly well both on smartphones and tablets;

Want more jigsaw puzzles? Check out more themes!
